00049 //
00050 // indri::index::TermListBuilder
00051 //
00052 // 14 July 2004 -- tds 
00053 //
00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_TERMLISTBUILDER_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_TERMLISTBUILDER_HPP
00057 
00058 #include "indri/FieldExtent.hpp"
00059 #include "indri/Buffer.hpp"
00060 #include "lemur/RVLCompress.hpp"
00061 #include "indri/RVLDecompressStream.hpp"
00062 #include "indri/FieldExtent.hpp"
00063 #include "indri/greedy_vector"
00064 
00065 namespace indri {
00066   namespace index {
00067     class TermListBuilder {
00068     private:
00069       greedy_vector<int> _terms;
00070       greedy_vector<FieldExtent> _fields;
00071 
00072     public:
00073       void clear() {
00074         _terms.clear();
00075         _fields.clear();
00076       }
00077 
00078       void addField( const indri::index::FieldExtent& field ) {
00079         _fields.push_back( field );
00080       }
00081 
00082       void addTerm( const int termID ) {
00083         _terms.push_back( termID );
00084       }
00085 
00086       greedy_vector<int>& terms() {
00087         return _terms;
00088       }
00089 
00090       const greedy_vector<int>& terms() const {
00091         return _terms;
00092       }
00093 
00094       greedy_vector<indri::index::FieldExtent>& fields() {
00095         return _fields;
00096       }
00097 
00098       const greedy_vector<indri::index::FieldExtent>& fields() const {
00099         return _fields;
00100       }
00101 
00102       void read( const char* buffer, int size ) {
00103         clear();
00104         RVLDecompressStream stream( buffer, size );
00105 
00106         int termCount;
00107         int fieldCount;
00108 
00109         stream >> termCount
00110               >> fieldCount;
00111 
00112         for( int i=0; i<termCount; i++ ) {
00113           int termID;
00114           stream >> termID;
00115           _terms.push_back( termID ); 
00116         }
00117 
00118         for( int i=0; i<fieldCount; i++ ) {
00119           FieldExtent extent;
00120 
00121           stream >> extent.id
00122                 >> extent.begin
00123                 >> extent.end
00124                 >> extent.number;
00125 
00126           _fields.push_back( extent );
00127         }
00128       }
00129 
00130       void write( Buffer& buffer ) {
00131         // format:
00132         //   term count
00133         //   field count
00134         //   termID * termCount (compressed)
00135         //   ( fieldID, begin, (delta begin) end, number ) * fieldCount
00136 
00137         buffer.clear();
00138         int length = 10 + 5 * _terms.size() + 2 * sizeof(FieldExtent) * _fields.size();
00139         char* begin = buffer.write( length );
00140         char* out = begin;
00141 
00142         // write count of terms and fields in the document first
00143         out = RVLCompress::compress_int( out, _terms.size() );
00144         out = RVLCompress::compress_int( out, _fields.size() );
00145 
00146         // write out terms
00147         int termsSize = RVLCompress::compress_ints( &_terms.front(), (unsigned char*) out, _terms.size() );
00148         out += termsSize;
00149 
00150         // write out fields
00151         for( unsigned int i=0; i<_fields.size(); i++ ) {
00152           out = RVLCompress::compress_int( out, _fields[i].id );
00153           out = RVLCompress::compress_int( out, _fields[i].begin );
00154           out = RVLCompress::compress_int( out, _fields[i].end );
00155           out = RVLCompress::compress_longlong( out, _fields[i].number );
00156         }
00157 
00158         buffer.unwrite( length - (out - begin) );
00159       }
00160     };
00161   }
00162 }
00163 
00164 #endif // INDRI_TERMLISTBUILDER_HPP
